name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuizRise | AI assistant for educators and learners.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuizRise is an AI-powered educational assistant that creates interactive educational materials in minutes, not hours.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QuizRise is an AI-powered educational assistant that creates interactive educational materials (quizzes, flashcards, summaries) in minutes, not hours.

What you can do with QuizRise:

✨ Save Time and Money: Automate the creation of training materials and save valuable time.
✨ Enjoy Your Private Tutor: Work more effectively with a tutor who answers your questions immediately and evaluates your answers.
✨ Create Quizzes and Flashcards: Generate content from your texts, files, links, and videos.
✨ Customize Your Content: Adapt colors to match your brand, and easily edit, add, or delete auto-generated questions, results, and answers.
✨ Share Easily: Use embed snippets to insert anywhere or share the public link to reach a wider audience.
✨ Gain Insights: Access valuable insights through built-in analytics.
✨ Integrate Every Language: Enjoy smooth support for 95 languages.
